title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, an error occurs and synchronization fails.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
